name: Pie Squares
description:
DUE TO UNFORTUNATE AND UNFORESEEN CIRCUMSTANCES THERE WILL BE NO FUTURE UPDATES OR BUG FIXES TO THE GAME. ADDITIONALLY, PIE SQUARES MAY NOT WORK ON SOME VERSIONS OF ANDROID.

Pie Squares is a new kind of matching game for mobile. Match the fruit on corners of rectangles to score points. Bigger rectangles means more points. Easy to learn but hard to master. Compete against yourself to score the highest points possible.

Programming and Design: David Brett

Art: Marv Riley

Audio: Emily E. Meo

Special thanks to Megan McKay for early prototype assets
